item.title: Lillie Bliss, MoMA’s Unheralded Founder, Gets a Close Look
item.description: She was one of three women who created the museum, and her gifts of art and money still make a difference after 90 years.

item.title: Jimmy Carter Was No Friend of the U.S. Navy
item.description: The late former president may have served honorably as a sailor, but his instincts as president were to shrink and deprioritize America’s naval forces...

item.title: An Alternative to Buying Greenland That Could Actually Work
item.description: Trump can use Greenland’s national interests to leverage a deal that gives him almost everything he wants. Here’s how.

item.title: A Sorry President
item.description: In trying to block Trump’s return, Biden made it inevitable.

item.title: Heinous Transit Crimes Recall Dark Days of Gotham
item.description: The party that aggressively pushes public transit over cars should do its utmost to ensure passengers are safe.
